#include<algorithm>
#include<cstdio>
#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
 
#define isPowerOfTwo(x)((x&(x-1))==0)
 
int main(){
    int test;
        for(scanf("%d",&test);test>0;test--){
                int n;
                scanf("%d",&n);
                if(isPowerOfTwo(n)) printf("No\n");
                else printf("Yes\n");
        }
        return 0;
}
